name: EA SPORTS MLB TAP BASEBALL 23
description:
EA SPORTS™ is bringing your MLB baseball game BACK with MLB Tap Baseball 2023 - the latest game in the Tap Sports™ Baseball franchise! Hit it out of the park and continue to build your MLB dynasty with today's best baseball players and everyone's favorite all-time greats!

MLB Baseball comes to your phone with the EA SPORTS MLB Tap Baseball mobile game. Manage a dream team of real MLB players from the most current rosters and travel to authentic ball parks. Play nine innings of gripping baseball action and power up your team to help your club rank at the top of the leaderboard! Tap to swing and hit a home run with simple controls - but keep your eye on the ball! Three strikes and you're OUT!

WHAT’S NEW IN TSB23
New JOURNEYS – Play iconic games with the best of the MLB!
PLAYOFFS are BACK – Prove you’re ready to level up!
More MOMENTS – Additional slots means more strategy!
Improved GRAPHICS – Realistic crowds and improved stadiums immerse you in the game!
CONNECT your TSB account and bring your favorite players from TSB 22!
60 MILLION franchise downloads and counting!
The COMPLETE MLB Experience!
• AUTHENTIC MLB in every way – 2022 MLB Teams, MLBPA Players, and MLB Ballparks
• COLLECT MLB players – From current superstars to the all time greats
• TEAM UP with baseball fans to dominate in Club Events and share the rewards
• PLAY ALL DAY with countless game modes: Master batting and pitching to rule the diamond!
• ALWAYS FRESH with content and challenges based on the REAL LIVE events of the MLB. Live-op events based on what’s happening with the MLB Season

DRAFT your lineup and BUILD YOUR TEAM
• CREATE your own player and add him to your team. Will he be the X-Factor?
• TEAM UP with baseball fans to dominate in Club Events and share the rewards
• COLLECT classic MOMENTS from baseball history and take your team to the next level

Build your all-star team and create your very own MLB dynasty in: EA SPORTS MLB TAP SPORTS BASEBALL 2023
--

This app: Requires acceptance of EA’s Privacy & Cookie Policy and User Agreement. Requires an Internet connection (network fees may apply). Includes in-game advertising. Collects data through third-party ad-serving and analytics technology (See Privacy & Cookie Policy for details). Contains direct links to the Internet and social networking sites intended for an audience over 13. Allows players to communicate. Includes optional in-game purchases of virtual currency that can be used to acquire virtual in-game items, including a random selection of virtual in-game items. This game includes optional in-game subscriptions. Subscriptions will automatically renew unless cancelled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can manage and cancel subscriptions anytime in your Apple ID account settings. The app uses Game Center. Log out of Game Center before installation if you don’t want to share your game play with friends.

User Agreement: terms.ea.com
Privacy and Cookie Policy: privacy.ea.com
Visit help.ea.com for assistance or inquiries.

Do Not Sell My Personal Information: https://tos.ea.com/legalapp/WEBPRIVACYCA/US/en/PC/

EA may retire online features after 30 days’ notice posted on ea.com/service-updates.
